name: Counterfeit Canyon
description:
Introduction

Possibly the quickest outing in Oak Creek Canyon. An ideal warmup, or could be linked up with king snake, or cookstove for a longer day.

Approach

Start at sterling pass. Break away from trail and head up canyon left through a break in the brush to the ridge up top.

Descent

3 rappels under 50'.

Exit

Follow drainage to road/ vehicle.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
